blogs.title: THE ONE PIECE IS REAALLLLL
blogs.body: CAN WE GET MUCH HIGHER SO HIGH OH OH OHHHHH OH OH OHHHHH OH OH
blogs.author: Whitebeard

blogs.title: July 25, 2023
blogs.body:
I need to continue my work on learning the MERN stack.  I am becoming slowly more comfortable with React, and my next step is likely working with MongoDB.

After Mongo, I should work with Express.js.  This would pretty much complete my introduction to the MERN stack...

Additionally, I have been thinking of branching this site off to repurpose it into a recipe site.  This would allow for more practice with React. I'm not sure if I should stop using create-react-app btw... I've heard that "you shouldn't use it" but I really don't see why not... Anyway... That's all for now
blogs.author: Whitebeard

blogs.title: July 26, 2023
blogs.body: I watched and followed along with a 1 hour MongoDB tutorial from BroCode.  Initial thoughts - I kinda like mongo better than sql, though I'm not sure they're directly comparable? Either way, next steps involve making a full stack application.  I have a Tyler Potts video queued up, but this dude is a "Todo app" merchant.  Bro doesn't know any other tutorial
blogs.author: Whitebeard
